text: Morten Sundli (born 31 March 1990) is a Norwegian footballer who plays for Ullensaker/Kisa.Morten Sundli klar på langtidskontrakt‚ ullkisafotball.no, 2 April 2018 He started his youth career in Roterud, and played youth and senior football for FF Lillehammer before being signed by Odds BK ahead of the 2009 season. == Career statistics == {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Season !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Division !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Total |- !Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |2009 |rowspan="2" valign="center"|Odd |rowspan="2" valign="center"|Tippeligaen |0||0||1||1||1||1 |- |2010 |8||0||1||1||9||1 |- |2011 |rowspan="6" valign="center"|Mjøndalen |rowspan="3" valign="center"|Adeccoligaen |30||0||3||0||33||0 |- |2012 |30||1||2||0||32||1 |- |2013 |28||1||5||0||33||1 |- |2014 |rowspan="1" valign="center"|1.
